LightningComponentBundle.description: A configurable related list component that supports any Salesforce object with dynamic field configuration via Field Sets

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The parent record ID. Use {!recordId} to dynamically use the current record ID.

property.name: selectedObject
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API name of the object to display. Examples: 'Account', 'Case', 'Internal_Asset_Request__c', 'Knowledge__kav'

property.name: relatedListLabel
property.label: Related List Label
property.description: Display name for this related list. Leave blank for auto-generated labels based on object type.

property.name: fieldSetName
property.label: Field Set API Name
property.description: Field set defining columns to display. Leave blank for smart defaults. Create Field Sets in Setup → Object Manager → [Object] → Field Sets.

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Record Limit
property.description: Number of records to display before showing 'View All'. Use 0 for smart defaults (default: 6 records).
